entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Forestville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
